body.p: This is a data set for testing ePub generation from DITA For Publihers publication maps. It contains content from the full Wizard of OZ sample publication. It includes all the main components of a full publication and enough chapters to hopefully exercise ToC generation well enough.

Here is a keyword keyref to chapter 1: A cyclone is also called a tornado.
